com.communote.plugins.core.services

Interface PluginPropertyService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PluginPropertyServiceImpl

    public interface PluginPropertyService
    Interface for the plugin property service.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/ TODO exception handling: throwing only generic checked exceptions will not allow to react in a specific way.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllApplicationProperties

        Map<String,String> getAllApplicationProperties()
        Returns all application properties for this bundle.
        Returns:
        A map of all properties for the bundle.

      • getAllApplicationProperties

        Map<String,String> getAllApplicationProperties(String symbolicName)
        Returns all application properties for the given bundle.
        Parameters:
        symbolicName - Symbolic name of the bundle.
        Returns:
        A map of all properties for the bundle.

        Returns:

      • getApplicationProperty

        String getApplicationProperty(String key)
                       throws PluginPropertyServiceException
        Returns an application property for this bundle.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the property.
        Returns:
        The properties value or null, if not set.
        Throws:
        PluginPropertyServiceException - Exception.

      • getApplicationProperty

        String getApplicationProperty(String symbolicName,
                              String key)
                       throws PluginPropertyServiceException
        Returns an application property for a specific bundle.
        Parameters:
        symbolicName - Symbolic name of the bundle, the property should be read from.
        key - The key of the property.
        Returns:
        The properties value or null, if not set.
        Throws:
        PluginPropertyServiceException - Exception.

      • getApplicationPropertyWithDefault

        String getApplicationPropertyWithDefault(String key,
                                         String defaultValue)
                                  throws PluginPropertyServiceException
        Returns an application property for this bundle.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the property.
        defaultValue - The default value.
        Returns:
        The properties value or the default value if no value is set.
        Throws:
        PluginPropertyServiceException - Exception.

      • getApplicationPropertyWithDefault

        String getApplicationPropertyWithDefault(String symbolicName,
                                         String key,
                                         String defaultValue)
                                  throws PluginPropertyServiceException
        Returns an application property for a specific bundle with default value.
        Parameters:
        symbolicName - Symbolic name of the bundle.
        key - The key of the property.
        defaultValue - The default value.
        Returns:
        The value or the default value if no value is set.
        Throws:
        PluginPropertyServiceException - Exception.

      • getClientProperty

        String getClientProperty(String key)
        Returns a property within the current clients scope.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the property.
        Returns:
        The value or the null, if no value is set.

      • getClientProperty

        String getClientProperty(String symbolicName,
                         String key)
        Returns a property within the current clients scope for the given bundle.
        Parameters:
        symbolicName - Symbolic name of the bundle to use.
        key - The key of the property.
        Returns:
        The value or null, if no value is set.

      • getClientPropertyAsObject

        <T extends Serializable> T getClientPropertyAsObject(String key,
                                                     Class<T> clazz)
                                              throws PluginPropertyServiceException
        Returns an instance of the given object.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the value.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the property.
        clazz - Class containing the result type.
        Returns:
        The value as object or null, if no value is set.
        Throws:
        PluginPropertyServiceException - Exception.

      • setApplicationProperty

        void setApplicationProperty(String key,
                            String value)
                     throws AuthorizationException
        Sets an application property.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the property.
        value - The value of the property.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current client is not the global client

      • setClientProperty

        void setClientProperty(String key,
                       String value)
        Sets a client property.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the property.
        value - The value. Set this to "null" to delete the property.

      • setClientPropertyAsObject

        void setClientPropertyAsObject(String key,
                               Serializable value)
                        throws PluginPropertyServiceException
        Sets a client property from an object.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the property.
        value - The value. Set this to "null" to delete the property.
        Throws:
        PluginPropertyServiceException - Exception.
